articles.title: 'Praise God': Natasha Stankovic shares another cryptic Instagram story amid Hardik Pandya divorce rumours - Firstpost
articles.description: This is the second time Natasha Stankovic has taken to Instagram to share a cryptic post ever since divorce rumours with all-rounder Hardik Pandya began circulating.
articles.content: Amid rumours of divorce with India all-rounder Hardik Pandya, Natasha Stankovic on Tuesday shared a story on her Instagram account, seeking for Gods blessings. The Instagram story that she had upload… [+2244 chars]
